comments_since_last_sample.body: Modi ji , your dressing signify a lot information , excellent. May the real freedom fighters soul experience peace. India has three unconditional friends : Russia , Isreal and France.

In India no french flags are burnt or calls for the ambassador to be kicked out [ Unlike our Neighbor ] However what I am wary off wrt France - They have sold defense systems & weapons along with Mirage fighters to Pakistan - I feel that India needs to ensure this stops if they want to trade & deal with us ie trade is to cease with Pakistan for India. Choice is theirs.
PM Modi energy for whole world
